We believe in careers, not Jobs.

Good people are the success of any organization. In PYRAMID TUTORIALS it is our vision to bring together the best people and give them the best environment along with good career opportunities and growth. If your dreams are fuelled by a desire to make a contribution to Education Sector, then move a step ahead.
At PYRAMID TUTORIALS, we look forward for people who can add value to our business and performance; have an excellent teamwork ethic, and are driven to take our organization and their own careers to new heights.
PYRAMID TUTORIALS welcomes you to join “Team PYRAMID”.
Candidates can send their resumes at careeratpyramid@gmail.com

Job Title: Faculty- Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, JEE, NEET, FOUNDATION
Main Responsibilities:
  • Planning, preparing and delivering lessons to all students in the class;
  • Teaching according to the educational needs, abilities and achievement of the individual students and groups of students;
  • Assigning work, correcting and marking work carried out by his/her students;
  • Assessing, recording and reporting on the development, progress, attainment and behavior of one’s students;
  • Providing guidance and advice to students on educational and social matters and on their further education and future careers; providing information on sources of more expert advice;
Key Qualifications:
  • PhD, B.E., M Sc graduate with excellent academic background and preferably from top institutes.
  • Should have expertise of the subject knowledge and skills for teaching Physics, Chemistry, Maths and Biology to IIT JEE, NEET aspirants respectively.
  • Experience in classroom teaching.
  • Should be experienced in mentoring, motivating and counseling students to achieve better performance at IIT JEE and NEET exam.
Experience:  2 – 10 years

Location: Manewada Centre, Nandanvan Centre, Hudkeshwar Centre.
BDM (Business Development Manager)

Job Description:

A business development manager’s main task is to facilitate the growth of the business for which he or she works. Working primarily with the marketing departments, this experienced professional develops training plans to educate and motivate employees of a company to perform at their most profitable level.

A day in the life of a business development manager might include tasks like:

  • Conducting Seminar
  • Collaboration with the marketing department
  • Coordination and Conduction of seminars in all leading schools of Vidarbha.
  • Conducting admission test, Filling up admission forms
  • Maintaining prospective student’s database.
  • Home to Home visit for Admissions convertion

Key Qualifications:

  • MBA will be preferred but not essential
  • Bachelor’s degree; master’s may be preferred

Key Skills:

  • Communication and strategic planning skills.
  • Business and finance understanding.

Experience:  1 to 5 years experience of business-to-business marketing, ideally with experience in the education sector.

Location: All over Maharashtra.

Job Title: Marketing Executive

Purpose of role: Support our marketing and communications strategy by taking the lead on day-to-day marketing activities.

Job Description:

  • Admission counseling to prospective students / parents and convincing / converting them to final admission.
  • Conducting admission test, filling up admission forms.
  • Participate and carry out seminars, workshops and other activities.
  • Managing marketing operations, developing business through local educational institutes, colleges, schools, coaching classes, educational trusts etc.
  • Planning, developing and implementing effective marketing communication campaigns.
  • Distributing copy for all marketing collateral, including brochures, letters.

 Key Qualifications:

  • MBA will be preferred but not essential
  • Bachelor’s degree; master’s may be preferred

Key Skills:

  • Problem-solving, critical thinking.
  • Communication and strategic planning skills.
  • Business and finance understanding.

Experience:  1 to 5 years experience of business-to-business marketing, ideally with experience in the education sector.

Location: All over Maharashtra.

Job Title: Academic Coordinators

Purpose of role:

The Academic Coordinators are key educational leaders within the Branch. They work as leaders of a team of staff and they themselves are integral members of the curriculum team. As key leaders within the college, they are expected to show initiative, be a visible presence, and be exemplary communicators within their own key learning areas and in the college community.

Job Description:

  • Must be able to take care of branch individually, including the Admin, Marketing and
  • Coordinating all academics activities like class scheduling, faculty coordination
  • Must have experience in handling similar responsibilities in a school/ coaching institute/ college.
  • Academic Coordinators are responsible for effective curriculum delivery, the achievement of departmental goals, learning outcomes and the meeting of targets and benchmarks.
  • Resource facility usage and management.
  • Must be a excellent Counselor to Get the Admissions converted from the Leads
  • Maintains communication between the branch and management by preparing daily, weekly, and month-end reports regarding management.
  • Ensuring that teaching resources are made available to colleagues.
  • Organizing regular meetings, circulating information.
  • Encouraging and fostering positive relationships with staff, students and parents

Key Qualifications:

  • MBA will be preferred but not essential
  • Bachelor’s degree; master’s may be preferred

Experience: 

  • 2-5 years of Experience in HR/Admin expected
  • Experience of working in Educational setup will be added advantage

Location: Manewada Centre, Nandanvan Centre, Hudkeshwar Centre.

Job Title: Counselor
Job Description:
  • Providing information about various courses to the students and guiding them about the best course which will be suitable for them.
  • Maintaining the record of the students joining the course and also keeping a track of the fees to be paid by the students joining the course.
  • Handling all types of queries by students and parents. Giving them solution.
  • Confer with parents or guardians, teachers, other counselors, and administrators to resolve students’ behavioral, academic, and other problems.
  • Prepare reports on students and activities as required by administration.
Key skills
  • Listening skills
  • Patience and a calm manner
  • Ability to relate to a wide range of people
  • Professional and positive approach to work
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Key Qualifications:
  • MBA will be preferred but not essential
  • Bachelor’s degree; master’s may be preferred
Experience:
  • 1-5 years of Experience in HR/Admin expected
  • Experience of working in Educational setup will be added advantage
Location: Manewada Centre, Nandanvan Centre, Hudkeshwar Centre.
Job Title: Assistant Teacher

Teaching Assistants are responsible for handling secretarial as well as academic and classroom management tasks that a teacher would otherwise do.

The role played by teaching assistants within institute can be vital in helping students gain basic literacy and numeric skills, particularly at key stage one. 

Job Description:

  • Help teachers with recordkeeping, such as tracking attendance and calculating grades
  • Help teachers prepare for lessons by getting materials ready or setting up equipment, such as computers
  • Reinforce lessons presented by teachers by reviewing material with students one-on-one or in small groups
  • Motivating and encouraging pupils
  • Assisting with marking and correcting work

 

Key Skills:

  • Classroom & Teacher Assistance
  • Special Education Support
  • Classroom Management Strategies
  • Class Material Preparation
  • Student Progress Monitoring

Key Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree; master’s may be preferred

Experience: 

  • 1-3 years of Experience
  • Fresher also apply

Location: Manewada Centre, Nandanvan Centre, Hudkeshwar Centre.

Job Title: Marketing Assistant (Office Work)

Job Description:

  • Assisting the marketing manager and supporting the marketing team with marketing activities..
  • Writing articles and promotional material for the company.
  • Preparing interesting written copy for the website.
  • Uploading marketing material to online libraries, internet groups and social media sites.
  • Updating and maintaining the marketing department’s documentation and databases.
  • Managing events, booking venues and ordering marketing materials.
  • Must be able to travel for business related matters
  • Email marketing
  • Social media
  • Data entry
  • Website updates 
  • Reporting for visitor numbers and digital platforms
  • Print management for exhibition promotional materials

Key Skills: 

  • Excellent communication skills
  • Specifically written English a high level of accuracy and attention to detail, proof reading and collating complex information into reports.
  • Excellent IT skills with specific experience of working with databases,  MS office applications and social media  Highly organized
  • Excellent time and project management
  • Skills with the ability to juggle a wide range of competing demands Ability to work under pressure and meet.

Key Qualifications: 

  • Marketing degree or other qualification
  • Arts related degree or other qualification
  • Experience of managing digital
  • Communication channels including websites, Facebook and Twitter.

 Work Experience: 

  • Previous experience of working in Marketing role
  • Relevant experience in an arts
  • Orgnisation and/or visitor attraction

Behaviours /characteristics:

  • A positive team player
  • Flexible and adaptable
  • Creative and innovative
  • Proactive and dynamic
  • Demonstrates initiative and personal leadership
Job Title: Telecaller

Job Description:

  • Make telephone calls to prospects
  • Contacting students or parents to inform them about courses or Fees Details.
  • Creating and Maintaining prospective students database , Taking follow ups
  • Keep accurate and detailed records of calls made and results achieved
  • Maintaining students information and contact details
  • Handling all types of queries by students and parents.

 Qualification & Skills Required:

  • Graduate with good communication Skills
  • Candidate should have relevant experience in similar field
  • Should have a flair of calling & interaction with parents with good persuasive skills
